Class.name: WiFIS.V20.Test.BP.CrearMsg
Class.Description: Ejemplo de Business Process que recibe un HL7 ER7, lo convierte a XML y lo empaqueta en un WiFIS.Msg.GenericReq para enviarlo al enrutador WiFIS.

XData.name: BPL
XData.Data: <process language='objectscript' request='EnsLib.HL7.Message' response='Ens.Response' height='2000' width='2000' > <context> <property name='GenericReq' type='WiFIS.V20.Msg.GenericReq' instantiate='0' > </property> </context> <sequence xend='200' yend='450' > <transform name='HL7 2 XML' class='WiFIS.V20.DT.HL72XML' source='request' target='context.GenericReq' xpos='200' ypos='250' > <annotation><![CDATA[Transformar HL7 de ER7 a XML y crear un WiFIS.V20.Msg.GenericReq]]></annotation> </transform> <call name='WiFIS Router' target='WiFIS_Router_V20' async='1' xpos='200' ypos='350' > <annotation><![CDATA[Enviar GenericReq a enrutador WiFIS para que lo envÃ­e donde corresponde]]></annotation> <request type='WiFIS.V20.Msg.GenericReq' > <assign property="callrequest" value="context.GenericReq" action="set" /> </request> <response type='Ens.Response' /> </call> </sequence> </process>

Parameter.name: SrcVer
Parameter.Description: Location and Revision of this file in Perforce (Auto-updating)
